title: downgradeInjectable
contents:
downgradeInjectable

npm 包 @angular/upgrade
模块 import { downgradeInjectable } from '@angular/upgrade/static';
源码 upgrade/src/common/downgrade_injectable.ts

用于支持 AoT 编译的混合升级应用程序的 upgrade/static 库的一部分

允许 Angular 服务从 AngularJS 访问。

function downgradeInjectable(token: any): Function;

link使用方法

首先确保要降级的服务在 NgModule 中提供，该 NgModule 将成为升级应用程序的一部分。例如，假设我们定义了 HeroesService

// This Angular service will be "downgraded" to be used in AngularJS @Injectable() class HeroesService { heroes: Hero[] = [ {name: 'superman', description: 'The man of steel'}, {name: 'wonder woman', description: 'Princess of the Amazons'}, {name: 'thor', description: 'The hammer-wielding god'} ]; constructor(@Inject('titleCase') titleCase: (v: string) => string) { // Change all the hero names to title case, using the "upgraded" AngularJS service this.heroes.forEach((hero: Hero) => hero.name = titleCase(hero.name)); } addHero() { this.heroes = this.heroes.concat([{name: 'Kamala Khan', description: 'Epic shape-shifting healer'}]); } removeHero(hero: Hero) { this.heroes = this.heroes.filter((item: Hero) => item !== hero); } }

并且我们已将其包含在升级应用程序的 NgModule 中

// This NgModule represents the Angular pieces of the application @NgModule({ declarations: [Ng2HeroesComponent, Ng1HeroComponentWrapper], providers: [ HeroesService, // Register an Angular provider whose value is the "upgraded" AngularJS service {provide: 'titleCase', useFactory: (i: any) => i.get('titleCase'), deps: ['$injector']} ], // All components that are to be "downgraded" must be declared as `entryComponents` entryComponents: [Ng2HeroesComponent], // We must import `UpgradeModule` to get access to the AngularJS core services imports: [BrowserModule, UpgradeModule] }) class Ng2AppModule { ngDoBootstrap() { /* this is a placeholder to stop the bootstrapper from complaining */ } }

现在，我们可以在 AngularJS 模块上为该服务注册 downgradeInjectable 工厂函数。

// Register an AngularJS service, whose value is the "downgraded" Angular injectable. ng1AppModule.factory('heroesService', downgradeInjectable(HeroesService) as any);

在 AngularJS 组件的控制器中，我们可以通过我们在降级时提供的名称来获取降级后的服务。

// This is our top level application component ng1AppModule.component('exampleApp', { // We inject the "downgraded" HeroesService into this AngularJS component // (We don't need the `HeroesService` type for AngularJS DI - it just helps with TypeScript // compilation) controller: [ 'heroesService', function(heroesService: HeroesService) { this.heroesService = heroesService; } ], // This template make use of the downgraded `ng2-heroes` component // Note that because its element is compiled by AngularJS we must use kebab-case attributes // for inputs and outputs template: `<link rel="stylesheet" href="./styles.css"> <ng2-heroes [heroes]="$ctrl.heroesService.heroes" (add-hero)="$ctrl.heroesService.addHero()" (remove-hero)="$ctrl.heroesService.removeHero($event)"> <h1>Heroes</h1> <p class="extra">There are {{ $ctrl.heroesService.heroes.length }} heroes.</p> </ng2-heroes>` } as any);

link说明

接收一个 token，用于标识从 Angular 提供的服务。

返回一个 工厂函数，该函数可用于在 AngularJS 模块上注册服务。

该工厂函数提供对由 token 参数标识的 Angular 服务的访问权限。
